00058 /*
00059  * Sends a LNP_DATA packet, given its contents.
00060  */
00061 static int send_data(net_id_t id_to, u_char *data, int length, u_char protocol);
00062 
00063 /*============================================================================*/
00064 /* Public functions implementations.                                          */
00065 /*============================================================================*/
00066 
00067 int lnp_handle_data(lnp_packet_p *packet, int content_length) {
00068         int return_value;
00069         int mac_length;
00070         u_short padding_length;
00071         int offset;
00072         u_char *plain_content = NULL;
00073         u_char *mac = NULL;
00074         u_char *real_mac = NULL;
00075         int routing_entry_index;
00076         int store_entry_index;
00077         u_char protocol;
00078         u_short timestamp;
00079         
00080         routing_entry_index = lnp_routing_entry_lock(packet->source);
00081         if (routing_entry_index == LNP_LOOKUP_ERROR) {
00082                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "connection not established.");
00083                 return LNP_ERROR; /* TODO colocar constantes adequada para este erro */
00084         }
00085                 
00086         if (routing_table[routing_entry_index].store_index == NULL_SLOT) {
00087                 /* TODO verificar */
00088                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "connection not established.");
00089                 return_value = LNP_ERROR;
00090                 goto return_label;
00091         } else {
00092                 store_entry_index = routing_table[routing_entry_index].store_index;
00093         }
00094 
00095         /* Calculating lengths before using them */
00096         if (lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].mac == NULL) {
00097                 /* TODO retirar isso */
00098                 mac_length = 0;
00099         } else {
00100                 mac_length = lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].mac->length;
00101         }
00102         content_length = content_length - mac_length;
00103         mac = &packet->content[content_length];
00104         
00105         /* Allocating memory for packet. */
00106         plain_content = (u_char *)malloc(content_length);
00107         real_mac = (u_char *)malloc(mac_length);
00108         if (real_mac == NULL) {
00109                 liblog_fatal(LAYER_NET, "error in malloc: %s.", strerror(errno));
00110                 return_value = LNP_ERROR;
00111                 goto return_label;
00112         }
00113         
00114         /* Decrypting content. */
00115         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].cipher->function(plain_content,
00116                         packet->content, 
00117                         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].cipher_in_key,
00118                         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].cipher_in_iv, 
00119                         content_length,
00120                         UTIL_WAY_DECRYPTION);
00121         
00122         
00123         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet decrypted.");
00124 
00125         /* Read the data after decrypted. */
00126         offset = content_length - sizeof(u_short);
00127         util_read_uint16(&padding_length, &offset, plain_content);
00128         
00129         offset = padding_length;
00130         util_read_byte  (&protocol, &offset, plain_content);
00131         util_read_uint16(&timestamp, &offset, plain_content);
00132 
00133         /* Generation MAC of the plain content. */
00134         if (lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].mac != NULL) {
00135                 /* TODO: retirar esse if == NULL*/
00136                 lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].mac->function(real_mac, plain_content,
00137                                 lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].mac_in_key, content_length);
00138         }
00139 
00140         if (memcmp(mac, real_mac, mac_length) != 0) {
00141                 /* Drop packet. */
00142                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "MAC mismatch. packet dropped.");
00143                 return_value = LNP_ERROR;
00144                 goto return_label;
00145         }
00146         
00147         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "MAC verified.");
00148         
00149         return_value = lnp_enqueue_datagram(packet->source,
00150                         &plain_content[padding_length + (sizeof(u_char) + sizeof(u_short))], 
00151                         content_length - padding_length 
00152                                         - (sizeof(u_char) + sizeof(u_short)) /* proto + tmstmp */
00153                                         - sizeof(u_short), /* padding length field */
00154                         protocol);
00155 
00156 return_label:
00157                         
00158         free(plain_content);
00159         free(real_mac);
00160 
00161         /* unlock routing entry */
00162         lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00163 
00164         return return_value;
00165 }
00166 /******************************************************************************/
00167 int lnp_read(net_id_t from, u_char *data, int max, u_char protocol) {
00168         int return_value = lnp_dequeue_datagram(from, data, max, protocol);
00169         return (return_value == LNP_ERROR ? NET_ERROR : return_value);
00170 }
00171 /******************************************************************************/
00172 int lnp_flush(u_char protocol) {
00173         net_id_t from;
00174         int return_value = 0;
00175         
00176         while (lnp_try_dequeue_datagram(from, NULL, -1, protocol) != LNP_ERROR) {
00177                 return_value++; 
00178         }
00179         return return_value;
00180 }
00181 /******************************************************************************/
00182 int lnp_write(net_id_t id_to, u_char *data, int length, u_char protocol) {
00183         int return_value;
00184 
00185         /* TODO TIRAR ISSO AKI!! */
00186         int routing_entry_index = lnp_add_id(id_to);
00187         int store_key_index = routing_table[routing_entry_index].store_index;
00188         if (store_key_index == NULL_SLOT) {
00189                 store_key_index = lnp_key_store_new();
00190                 routing_table[routing_entry_index].store_index = store_key_index;
00191                 lnp_key_store[store_key_index].cipher = util_get_cipher("none");
00192         }
00193         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "store_key_index %d\n", store_key_index);
00194         
00195         return_value = send_data(id_to, data, length, protocol);
00196         
00197         return (return_value == LNP_OK ? NET_OK : NET_ERROR);
00198 }
00199 
00200 /*============================================================================*/
00201 /* Private functions implementations.                                         */
00202 /*============================================================================*/
00203 
00204 int send_data(net_id_t id_to, u_char *data, int length, u_char protocol) {
00205         int return_value;
00206         int offset;
00207         u_short padding_length;
00208         int packet_length;
00209         int content_length;
00210         int mac_length;
00211         u_char *mac = NULL;
00212         u_char *padding = NULL;
00213         u_char *packet = NULL;
00214         u_char *content = NULL;
00215         u_char *plain_content = NULL;
00216         u_char ttl = 0;
00217         u_char flags = 0;
00218         int routing_entry_index;
00219         int store_entry_index;
00220         
00221         routing_entry_index = lnp_routing_entry_lock(id_to);
00222         if (routing_entry_index == LNP_LOOKUP_ERROR) {
00223                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "connection not established.");
00224                 return LNP_ERROR; /* TODO colocar constantes adequada para este erro */
00225         }
00226                 
00227         if (routing_table[routing_entry_index].store_index == NULL_SLOT) {
00228                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "connection not established.");
00229                 return_value = LNP_ERROR;
00230                 goto return_label;
00231         } else {
00232                 store_entry_index = routing_table[routing_entry_index].store_index;
00233         }
00234 
00235         /* Determining the MAC length. */
00236         if (lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].mac == NULL) {
00237                 /* TODO retirar isso */
00238                 mac_length = 0;
00239         } else {
00240                 mac_length = lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].mac->length;
00241         }
00242 
00243         /* Computing padding length. */
00244         padding_length = LIBFREEDOM_FTU;
00245         padding_length = padding_length 
00246                         - (3*sizeof(u_char) + 2*NET_ID_LENGTH) /* header */
00247                         - mac_length; /* mac */
00248         /* alignment */                 
00249         padding_length = padding_length - (padding_length % 
00250                         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].cipher->block_size);
00251         padding_length = padding_length 
00252                         - (sizeof(u_char) + 2*sizeof(u_short)) /* proto + timestamp + pad */
00253                         - length; /* payload */
00254         if (padding_length < LNP_MIN_PADDING_LENGTH) {
00255                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "packet too large.");
00256                 return_value = LNP_ERROR;
00257                 goto return_label;
00258                 /*padding_length += lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].cipher->block_size;*/
00259         }
00260         
00261         /* Determining content length. */
00262         content_length = 
00263                         (sizeof(u_char) + 2*sizeof(u_short)) /* proto + timestamp + pad */
00264                         + padding_length 
00265                         + length;
00266         
00267         /* Determining the packet_size. */
00268         packet_length = 3*sizeof(u_char) + 2*NET_ID_LENGTH 
00269                         + content_length
00270                         + mac_length;
00271 
00272         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "payload has %d bytes, MAC = %d, content = %d, FTU = %d\n",
00273                         length, mac_length, content_length, LIBFREEDOM_FTU);
00274         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "padding will be %d bytes long and packet will be "
00275                         "%d bytes long.", padding_length, packet_length);
00276 
00277         /* Allocating buffers. */
00278         packet = (u_char*)malloc(packet_length);
00279         padding = (u_char*)malloc(padding_length);
00280         plain_content = (u_char*)malloc(content_length);
00281         mac = (u_char*)malloc(mac_length);
00282 
00283         if (packet == NULL || plain_content == NULL || mac == NULL ||
00284                         padding == NULL) {
00285                 liblog_fatal(LAYER_NET, "error in malloc: %s.", strerror(errno));
00286                 return_value = LNP_ERROR;
00287                 goto return_label;
00288         }
00289         
00290         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "memory for packet construction allocated.");
00291         
00292         /* Generating padding. */
00293         if (util_rand_bytes(padding, padding_length) == LNP_ERROR) {
00294                 liblog_error(LAYER_NET, "error generating padding.");
00295                 return_value = LNP_ERROR;
00296                 goto return_label;
00297         }
00298         
00299         /* Constructing content. */
00300         offset = 0;
00301         util_rand_bytes (padding, padding_length);
00302         util_join_bytes (plain_content, &offset, padding, padding_length);
00303         util_join_byte  (plain_content, &offset, protocol);
00304         util_join_uint16(plain_content, &offset, lnp_get_local_clock());
00305         util_join_bytes (plain_content, &offset, data, length);
00306         util_join_uint16(plain_content, &offset, padding_length);
00307         
00308         /* Generating MAC of the plaintext content. */
00309         if (lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].mac != NULL) {
00310                 /* TODO: tirar todos os mac==NULL) */
00311                 lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].mac->function(mac, plain_content,
00312                                 lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].mac_out_key, content_length);
00313         }
00314         
00315         /* Constructing LNP_DATA packet. */
00316         offset = 0;
00317         util_join_byte  (packet, &offset, LNP_DATA);
00318         util_join_byte  (packet, &offset, ttl);
00319         util_join_bytes (packet, &offset, my_id, NET_ID_LENGTH);
00320         util_join_bytes (packet, &offset, id_to, NET_ID_LENGTH);
00321         util_join_byte  (packet, &offset, flags);
00322 
00323         /* Placing encrypted content in packet. */
00324         content = &packet[offset]; /* address to content be placed */
00325         offset += content_length;  /* skipping the content field */
00326 
00327         /* Writing MAC on packet. */
00328         util_join_bytes (packet, &offset, mac, mac_length);
00329         
00330         /* Encrypting content */
00331         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].cipher->function(content, plain_content, 
00332                         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].cipher_out_key,
00333                         lnp_key_store[store_entry_index].cipher_out_iv, content_length,
00334                         UTIL_WAY_ENCRYPTION);
00335                         
00336         return_value = LNP_OK;
00337         
00338         /* Sending packet. */
00339         if (lnp_link_write(packet, offset) == LNP_ERROR) {
00340                 liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "error sending packet.");
00341                 return_value = LNP_ERROR;
00342                 goto return_label;
00343         }
00344         
00345         liblog_debug(LAYER_NET, "packet sent.");
00346 
00347 return_label:
00348         
00349         free(packet);
00350         free(plain_content);
00351         free(mac);
00352         free(padding);
00353         
00354         /* unlock routing entry */
00355         lnp_routing_entry_unlock(routing_entry_index);
00356         
00357         return return_value;
00358 }
